comment.author: 52581810@N02
comment._content: Class 06 of the pre war Deutsche Reichsbahn Gesellschaft (DRG). A very big boy for European circumstances with its 4-8-4 (2 D 2) axle configuration. Usually engines for fast trains had the 4-6-2 (2 C 1) configuration. Only two of these heavies were built in the late thirties. They were probably too heavy and/or too expensive.
